thread.section_title: Teleflora Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Teleflora | www.teleflora.com
thread.title: b schultz

author: b schultz
title: b schultz
text: Ordered flowers via internet 5 days prior to our 40th wedding Anniversary. The day flowers where due to be delivered at 11am I get an email order cannot be completed on this date, please choose new delivery date. Called customer service, put on hold for 8 minutes. Told customer service to cancel order, put on hold another 5 minutes. The topper, "your credit card will be credited in 2 to 10 business days". NEVER AGAIN
